# Required parts

Due Wednesday, November 15 by midnight [on Moodle](https://moodle.macalester.edu/mod/assign/view.php?id=48377).

- Complete the [Additional Exercises](13-databases.qmd#additional-exercises) in the "SQL Practice: Stack Exchange Data Explorer" part of our [databases+SQL activity](13-databases.qmd).
- Complete the "SQL Practice: Murder Mystery" section of our [databases+SQL activity](13-databases.qmd).

Update the header information in your `.qmd` to look like this:

```yaml
title: "Homework 7"
author: "YOUR NAME"
format: 
  html:
    self-contained: true
```

When you render this `.qmd`, this will create an HTML file in which images are embedded. Submit this HTML file on Moodle.
